description: Returns the IdNamespace with a given name, if it exists.

parameters.name: idNamespaceName
parameters.description: The name of the ID namespace.

nested_items.name: idNamespaceName
nested_items.description: The name of the ID namespace.

nested_items.name: idNamespaceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the ID namespace.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the ID namespace.

nested_items.name: inputSourceConfig
nested_items.description: A list of InputSource objects, which have the fields InputSourceARN and SchemaName.

nested_items.name: inputSourceARN
nested_items.description: An Glue table Amazon Resource Name (ARN) or a matching workflow ARN for the input source table.

nested_items.name: schemaName
nested_items.description: The name of the schema.

nested_items.name: idMappingWorkflowProperties
nested_items.description: Determines the properties of IdMappingWorkflow where this IdNamespace can be used as a Source or a Target.

nested_items.name: idMappingType
nested_items.description: The type of ID mapping.

nested_items.name: ruleBasedProperties
nested_items.description: An object which defines any additional configurations required by rule-based matching.

nested_items.name: rules
nested_items.description: The rules for the ID namespace.

nested_items.name: ruleName
nested_items.description: A name for the matching rule.

nested_items.name: matchingKeys
nested_items.description: A list of MatchingKeys. The MatchingKeys must have been defined in the SchemaMapping. Two records are considered to match according to this rule if all of the MatchingKeys match.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ruleDefinitionTypes
nested_items.description: The sets of rules you can use in an ID mapping workflow. The limitations specified for the source and target must be compatible.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: attributeMatchingModel
nested_items.description: The comparison type. You can either choose ONE_TO_ONE or MANY_TO_MANY as the attributeMatchingModel.

nested_items.name: recordMatchingModels
nested_items.description: The type of matching record that is allowed to be used in an ID mapping workflow.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: providerProperties
nested_items.description: An object which defines any additional configurations required by the provider service.

nested_items.name: providerServiceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the provider service.

nested_items.name: providerConfiguration
nested_items.description: An object which defines any additional configurations required by the provider service.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of ID namespace. There are two types: SOURCE and TARGET.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role. Entity Resolution assumes this role to access the resources defined in this IdNamespace on your behalf as part of a workflow run.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the ID namespace was created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the ID namespace was last updated.
(string) ---
(string) ---
